title: [Lumnea Meadow]
description: The path widens abruptly as it meets the thick green grass of the meadow.  Occasional trees dot the landscape, colorful silken tents pitched among them like brightly hued flowers.  A carved stone bench sits beneath a nearby rose-covered arbor, providing a cool and shady resting place from the bright sunlight.

The path widens abruptly as it meets the thick green grass of the meadow.  Occasional trees dot the landscape, colorful silken tents pitched among them like brightly hued flowers.  A carved stone bench sits beneath a nearby rose-covered arbor, providing a quiet resting place from which to enjoy the shimmering night sky.
